description:
In the course of an invention process, the "Green Grassland Chief Inventor", Slow Sheep, accidentally lost his inventive ability. In order to help Slow Goat to get back his inventive ability, the little sheep are ready to go to the Invention Planet to seek help from the genius inventor "Miaoduo Duo". When the lambs find Miaoduo, they discover that Wolffy has already cheated the super invention chariot "Jubilee" and is ready to target the lambs.
source: bgm.tv/deepl

OTHER: 33:喜羊羊与灰太狼之发明大作战

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Faming Da Zuozhan
喜羊羊与灰太狼之发明大作战
